message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.AI, cs.NE 

The paper deals with video action recognition, which is a task in computer vision. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also proposes a novel network architecture and introduces a new operator for video analysis tasks, which involves machine learning techniques. Hence, cs.LG (Machine Learning) is also a likely sub-category. Additionally, the paper deals with spatiotemporal features and their correlations, which falls under the scope of cs.MM (Multimedia). The paper also proposes a hierarchical fusion strategy and a unified spatiotemporal loss, which involves optimization techniques and can be categorized under cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). Finally, the paper introduces a new operator for efficient training of bilinear fusion operations, which can be categorized under cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
